text: Ko Lan (also known as Koh Larn) is a coral island located about 7.5 kilometers away from Pattaya in Thailand. It covers an area of 5.6 square kilometers. The island is part of Mu Ko Lanta National Park in Thailand. ==Geography== Ko Lan is 4.65 kilometres long and 2.15 kilometres wide. Its highest point is 180 metres above sea level. It has a tropical forest and is known for its six beautiful beaches with white sand and clear blue water. ==References== Category:Islands of Asia Category:Geography of Thailand
title: Ko Lan
